section.description: This property only appears when the '[Show UX Component validation errors in popup-window]' property is checked. The popup-window will only work with validation and error reports that happen on the component level. To define component level validation use the [dialogValidate] event on the [Server-side] events page, found in the 'Events' section of the UX Builder's main menu. The title of the popup-window can be defined using the '[UX Properties Error messages popup-window title]' property.
